Analytics AutomatedÂ¶

Analytics Automated is a lightweight framework for configuring pipelines of data processing tasks which users can call as webservices. It is targeted principally at running statistical and mathematical models for the purposes of Data Science. You can however use it to convert any code in to a web service.

Another way to look at it is that it turns your data analysis pipelines in to RESTful web services for the purposes making your models part of your SOA
